item.title: Essentials of Blogging with Hugo!
item.description: Here are few links and commands that will assist you in writing blog posts with hugo. Markdown Cheatsheet When setting up Hugo on a new machine, don’t forget to run the below commands to init submodules. git submodule init git submodule update Clean Serve Hugo: hugo server --renderToDisk --gc --cleanDestinationDir hr, .prose :where(hr):not(:where([class~=not-prose], [class~=not-prose] *)) { margin: 16px 0; } .intro { display: flex; flex-direction: row; justify-content: flex-start; align-items: start; } .
